name: Town Foot Soldier
description: A dependable militia fighter trained to hold the line in village skirmishes.

name: Village Archer
description: A hunter turned archer, skilled at striking from the treeline.

name: Apprentice Mage
description: A novice in the arcane arts, eager to prove their worth with basic spells.

name: Loyal Squire
description: A young hopeful clad in hand-me-down armor, ready to serve and learn.

name: Wildlands Scout
description: A nimble traveler of the forest paths, skilled in tracking and survival.

name: Healer Initiate
description: A temple trainee with minor restorative magic and herbal knowledge.

name: Farmstead Guard
description: A pitchfork-wielding defender of fields and family.

name: Tavern Brawler
description: Tough as nails and fueled by ale, this brawler handles trouble with fists.

name: Woodland Hermit
description: An odd recluse with strange charms and a squirrel companion.

name: Swift Messenger
description: A runner who knows the roads and relays messages under any threat.

name: Duskblade Knight
description: A disciplined warrior trained in both blade and shadow, guarding the kingdom's borders at twilight.

name: Ember Seer
description: A fire-touched mage who sees fate in the flames and scorches foes with ember curses.

name: Stonewarden
description: Clad in rune-inscribed stoneplate, this guardian channels ancient power to shield allies.

name: Windrider Scout
description: An elite outrider who can traverse the wilds at remarkable speed, warning of danger before it arrives.

name: Veil Cleric
description: A quiet priest of the lunar veil, adept in warding magics and subtle healing rituals.

name: Runeblade Apprentice
description: A student of ancient sword-magic, capable of infusing strikes with unstable arcane energy.

name: Battle Ranger
description: Equally skilled with bow and blade, this seasoned woodsman strikes swiftly from cover.

name: Ashen Warlock
description: Draped in cinders and whispered pacts, the warlock summons minor spirits to do their bidding.

name: Glaivemaster
description: A disciplined martial artist whose sweeping glaive forms keep foes at bay with deadly precision.

name: Gravetender
description: A somber caretaker who communes with the dead and commands protective bone wards.

name: Solar Paladin
description: A radiant champion of the sun, wielding divine light to smite darkness and protect allies.

name: Shadowblade Assassin
description: A master of stealth and lethal precision, striking swiftly from the shadows with deadly grace.

name: Emberstorm Sorcerer
description: Harnesses the fury of blazing storms, unleashing fiery chaos upon enemies in a torrent of destruction.

name: Frostguard Warden
description: A stalwart defender forged in icy realms, freezing foes in place and shielding comrades from harm.

name: Dawnseeker Ranger
description: An elite tracker who blends with the morning light, delivering precise strikes before foes can react.

name: Ironfist Berserker
description: A fearsome warrior who channels raw fury into devastating blows that crush all in their path.

name: Mystic Seer
description: A sage with deep foresight, weaving arcane knowledge to manipulate the battlefield's flow.

name: Voidblade Duelist
description: Wields a blade forged from the void itself, striking with supernatural speed and precision.

name: Stormbreaker Champion
description: Calls down lightning to empower their strikes, breaking enemy ranks with electrifying force.

name: Gloomwarden
description: A shadowy sentinel who guards forgotten places, unleashing darkness to blind and weaken foes.

name: Stormlord Valerian
description: A legendary commander who commands thunder and lightning, devastating enemies with storm fury.

name: Blade Dancer Elyra
description: A graceful warrior whose deadly swordplay weaves through enemies with unmatched speed and precision.

name: Arcane Sentinel
description: A towering guardian infused with arcane energy, shielding allies and unleashing magical blasts.

name: Ember Revenant
description: A fiery spirit risen from ashes, burning enemies with relentless fury and unyielding resolve.

name: Frostborn Warlord
description: An ice-clad conqueror who freezes the battlefield, shattering foes with brutal strikes.

name: Shadowbane Inquisitor
description: Hunter of darkness who purges evil with holy wrath and unbreakable conviction.

name: Soulforge Blacksmith
description: Master craftsman whose enchanted weapons bring death and despair to enemies.

name: Ironclad Paladin
description: A bastion of defense clad in impenetrable armor, standing firm against overwhelming odds.

name: Windrunner Scout
description: Fleet-footed and sharp-eyed, strikes first and vanishes before enemies can retaliate.

name: Thunderstrike Champion
description: Calls the fury of storms down upon foes, crushing them with electrifying might.

name: Aurion Stormbreaker
description: The fabled hero who shattered the sky's wrath, wielding thunder to protect the realms.

name: Seraphina Dawnblade
description: A radiant warrior whose sword shines with the light of dawn, banishing darkness.

name: Valdris Shadowbane
description: The relentless hunter of shadows, feared by evil and revered by allies.

name: Lyra Windwhisper
description: A mystic archer who commands the winds, striking silently and vanishing like the breeze.

name: Drakor Ironfist
description: A titan of strength whose fists crush mountains and enemies alike.

name: Elowen Moonshadow
description: An elusive assassin who blends with the night, striking with deadly precision.

name: Thalor Fireheart
description: A fierce pyromancer whose burning passion ignites the battlefield.

name: Isolde Soulwarden
description: Guardian of the sacred realm, wielding holy power to heal and protect.

name: Ragnar Thundermaul
description: Warlord of the storm clans, smashing foes with the might of the tempest.

name: Lyssara Everlight
description: A beacon of hope and justice, whose presence inspires allies to victory.
